title: Account Sync for Office says "Sync off for all items" .
content:
Account Sync for Office  says "Sync off for all items" . When I open the account, nothing is listed.  When I open the menu, the only option, "Sync now", is grayed out and doesn't perform a function when pressed.  How do I turn on synch for Office?  Without it, contacts I enter in Outlook from my desktop are not synched with the Pixel contact file.

Thank you...
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a (5G)
